# Define your compiler
CC = gcc

# Define any compile-time flags
CFLAGS = -Wall -Wextra -g

# The first rule is the default target:
all: bst

# "bst" is our final executable
bst: main.c bst.c
	$(CC) $(CFLAGS) -o bst main.c bst.c

# "clean" is a common target to remove generated files
clean:
	rm -f bst *.o
